title: Maria Xica
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A restaurant/bar located in front of the Hotel Palacio dos Melos in a restored house in the historic center. Serves typical regional food with a modern and cool touch. Has many vegan dishes on the menu, including mushroom pastry, sauteed veggies, chickpea salad and soy ice cream. Staff understands veganism. Upon advance request, will prepare a (most times regional) dish using veggies, vegan sausages, tofu, etc. Has regular cultural events.
streetAddress: Centro Historico de Viseu, Rua Chao do Mestre
